Jonan did a stellar job creating my website.  I can't only pick 3 attributes--everything he did was awesome.  What I loved most was his competitive spirit to make my website the best in the industry and take down the competition. I HIGHLY recommend him.

summary: I am a Developer Advocate at Heroku. I love my work but I will consider other offers that allow me to expense Magic: The Gathering cards on the corporate card. I like Ruby, robots and you. I'm happiest working on a team of dedicated dreamers who are unlikely to maintain the status quo for it's own sake.We are capable of amazing things and filled with powerful ideas, there's no reason to spend our lives doing anything but our best work.
